definition: to nibble away at sth/to eat into/to erode
quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals

sentences.english: Is a first article run prior to etching the lot to confirm etcher settings and linewidths?
sentences.chinese: 在批量蝕刻前是否進行首件與確認蝕刻機設備與線徑？

sentences.english: Is a first article run prior to etching the lot to confirm etcher settings and linewidths?
sentences.chinese: 在批量蝕刻前是否進行首件與確認蝕刻機設備與線徑？

sentences.english: Water alone cannot etch a metal surface.
sentences.chinese: 單獨使用水不能蝕刻金屬表面。

sentences.english: The image, which measures 200x290 micro-meters, features a Christmas tree, and is etched on a tiny piece of glass.
sentences.chinese: 賀卡上聖誕樹的圖案是在一小塊玻璃上蝕刻而成的。

sentences.english: Phosphor changes indium chip to need more than silicon chip second precipitate and etch.
sentences.chinese: 磷化銦晶片比硅片需要更屢次的積澱和蝕刻。

sentences.english: Components of the etchant may be isolated and used to general additional etchant.
sentences.chinese: 可隔離所述蝕刻劑的組分並將其用於一般額外蝕刻劑。

sentences.english: Components of the etchant may be isolated and used to general additional etchant.
sentences.chinese: 可隔離所述蝕刻劑的組分並將其用於一般額外蝕刻劑。

sentences.english: These etchings form the paths that electricity follows in the chip.
sentences.chinese: 這些蝕刻版畫形成路徑電在薄片中跟隨。

sentences.english: Mirror Finish, Etching Finish, Hairline Finish.
Structured bag with double short handles and a spring-action etched logo lock.
sentences.chinese: 雙短手柄和彈簧行動蝕刻標識鎖的結構性袋。

sentences.english: Afine etched gilt German burgonet, probably Augsburg, ca. 1585.
sentences.chinese: 蝕刻鍍金德國鋼盔奧格斯堡1585。

sentences.english: I like to think of these engravings as the ultimate science tattoos.
sentences.chinese: 我將這些蝕刻圖案當成終極的科學紋身紋在身上。

sentences.english: Why not use photolithography to make nano structures?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不使用光蝕刻法制造奈米結構？

sentences.english: Held first one-man show of etchings in Sydney and Melbourne.
sentences.chinese: 首先舉行單人表演的蝕刻在悉尼和墨爾本。

sentences.english: This unit group also includes workers who etch or chemically mill metal pieces.
sentences.chinese: 此單元組還包括進行蝕刻或化學金屬磨片的工人。

sentences.english: The technology used for making the objects is that of bending metal tubes and wood etching.
sentences.chinese: 製作那個物體用到的技術有金屬管彎曲和木料蝕刻。
